front.title: Discovery of Oblivious Services via Service Binding Records

abstract.t: This document defines a parameter that can be included in SVCB and HTTPS DNS resource records to denote that a service is accessible using Oblivious HTTP, with an indication of which Oblivious Gateway Resource to use to access the service (as an Oblivious Target Resource). This document also defines a mechanism to learn the key configuration of the related Oblivious Gateway Resource.
